mapper.select: select callflag, calluserid, calluserpw from TB_XENV where spjangcd = 'ZZ'

SELECT substring(a.recedate, 5,2) + '-' + substring(a.recedate, 7,2) as recedate, Left(a.recetime,2)+ ':' + substring(a.recetime, 3,2) as recetime, substring(a.actnm,0,15) as actnm, a.equpnm as equpnm, a.cnt as cnt, a.ascnt as ascnt, a.pernm AS actpernm, a.contnm as contnm, a.tel as tel, a.repernm as repernm FROM ( SELECT a.custcd, a.spjangcd, a.cltcd, a.actcd, a.equpcd, a.recedate, a.recetime, q.actnm, m.equpnm, 1 as cnt, 1 as ascnt, a.contcd, p.contnm, a.contents as contremark, g.pernm as repernm, d.pernm, q.tel as tel FROM tb_e401 a WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_E601 q WITH(NOLOCK) ON (a.custcd = q.custcd AND a.spjangcd = q.spjangcd AND a.actcd = q.actcd) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_E611 m WITH(NOLOCK) ON (a.custcd = m.custcd AND a.spjangcd = m.spjangcd AND a.actcd = m.actcd AND a.equpcd = m.equpcd) LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_e010 p WITH(NOLOCK) ON (a.custcd = p.custcd AND a.spjangcd = p.spjangcd AND a.contcd = p.contcd) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_JA001 g WITH(NOLOCK) ON (a.custcd = g.custcd AND a.spjangcd = g.spjangcd AND a.reperid = substring(g.perid, 2, 10)) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_JA001 d WITH(NOLOCK) ON (a.custcd = d.custcd AND a.spjangcd = d.spjangcd AND a.perid = substring(d.perid, 2, 10)) ) a WHERE a.recedate between #{frdate} and #{todate} AND isnull(a.actnm,'') Like concat('%',#{actcd},'%') ORDER BY A.recedate, A.recetime desc
